property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After your attack deals 4 or more damage to your opponent, they must choose and destroy 1 foundation in their staging area. R Commit: After you play an attack, it gets +X damage. X equals the number of cards in your opponent's staging area that were destroyed this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If you discard this card due to your opponent's card effect, commit X cards in your opponent's staging area. X equals your opponent's printed hand size. F (5+): Your opponent destroys X of their assets. X equals 6 minus the control of the card checked for this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E (5+): If your non-throw attack deals damage, each player destroys X foundations in their staging area. X equals the control value of the card checked for this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, commit 1 foundation: After your opponent plays an action as an enhance or a response, cancel its effects and discard the card from their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Before each player's End Phase begins, they lose 1 vitality if they did not play an attack this turn. R Commit: Before your opponent's End Phase begins, your opponent destroys 1 foundation in their staging area. Only playable if you have less cards in your staging area than your opponent has in their staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +3 damage. Only playable while your opponent has 5 or fewer cards in their staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: [Death] E: If this attack deals damage, destroy 1 of your opponent's committed foundations. Combo E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the printed damage of the immediately preceding attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may only play this card if there is at least 1 other attack in your card pool. E Lose 2 vitality: For the rest of this Enhance Phase, your opponent cannot play action cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals 4 or more damage, your opponent discards their entire momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of foundations in your staging area. Only playable if you have 5 or less foundations in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy a foundation: If your attack deals damage, your opponent must destroy 1 of their foundations of assets.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of foundations destroyed this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets -X difficulty. X equals the amount of damage your attack deals. Only playable if you have less foundations in your staging area than your opponent has in their staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this foundation: After your opponent plays an ability on a foundation in their staging area, destroy that foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this foundation: After your opponent destroys 1 of their foundations due to one of your card effects, your opponent must destroy another foundation or asset in their staging area. Only playable if you have less cards in your staging area than your opponent has in their staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this foundation: Before your opponent gains vitality due to their card effect, they lose X vitality instead of gaining vitality. X equals the amount of vitality they would have gained due to their card effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E (4+): This attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of resource symbols your opponent's character has that do not match your character's resource symbols. First F Lose 2 vitality: Until the beginning of your next Combat Phase, your opponent's character gains the [Death], [Evil], or [Void] symbol (your choice).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, choose 1 foundation or asset in your opponent's staging area and turn it face down. That card is now considered to be a foundation with a blank text box.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: If the next card you play this turn is an attack, it gets +3 damage and +2 speed. E: Your opponent's weapon attack gets -3 damage (minimum 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays an ability that commits 1 card in your staging area, choose 1 foundation in your opponent's staging area and turn it face down. That card is considered to be a foundation with a blank text box.

card.name: Tower of Rememberance - Spiral of Time

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Discard All cards in your hand, and then draw a number of cards equal to the number of cards you discarded. R Commit 1 foundation: After a player plays a non-attack card, they must draw 1 card, and then add 1 random card from their hand to the bottom of their deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent modifies your control check, draw X cards. X equals the amount your control check was modified by. Failing that control check will not end your Combat Phase. Discard this card from your card pool. E: If this attack deals damage, add the top card of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play an attack, you may discard 1 card to draw 1 card. R Commit: After your opponent plays an ability that draws cards or adds cards to their hand, cancel that ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play an attack you may discard 1 card to draw 1 card. R Commit: After your opponent draws cards due to a card effect, draw X cards. X equals the number of cards your opponent drew.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your staging area, each player gets +1 hand size. E Commit: Your and your opponent each discard 1 card and then draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Discard 1 card and then draw 1 card. Combo E: Draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText

property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, discard 2 cards from your hand and then draw 2 cards.

property.value: R Commit: After your opponent modifies your control check, reveal the top card of your deck. Your control check gets +X. X equals the control value of the revealed card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Take 1 card from your momentum and add it to your hand. You may discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText

property.value: R (5+): Before you make a control check to play a card, that check gets +1. Only playable while committed. R (3+): Before your opponent makes a control check, that check equals the check you made for this ability. Failing that check will not end your opponent's Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your opponent makes a control check. Your opponent's next control check to play an attack gets -X. X equals half of the control value of the checked card (rounded up). Failing that control check will not end your opponent's Combat Phase. Only playable during your opponent's attack.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText

Cervantes E (6+): For the rest of this Enhance Phase, if your opponent plays an enhance ability on a card in their staging area, they must make a control check against a difficulty of 5 as an additional cost or that ability is canceled.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy X foundations: Your next control check this turn gets +X. X cannot be greater than the number of cards in your card pool.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent makes a control check, make a control check. Your opponent's control check is equal to your control check. Failing this control check will not end your opponent's Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you check an asset, add that asset to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Make a control check. Your next control check this turn is equal to that control check (no control check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: The next printed 3 difficulty or less attack you attempt to play this turn ignores progressive difficulty. R Commit 1 foundation: After you attack deals 3 damage or less, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Destroy a weapon asset: Take one weapon asset from your hand and add it to your staging area ready. Ivy F: Until the end of this turn, All attacks with a printed difficulty of 3 or less do not add to the progressive difficulty of attacks.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack with a printed difficulty of 3 or less does not count towards progressive difficulty during this turn. E Commit 1 foundation: Your printed 3 difficulty or less attack gets +2 damage. Only playable while committed.

card.name: Ice Coffin of the Sleeping Ancient

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your staging area, players cannot gain vitality. E Commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets +X speed. X equals the printed speed of the immediately preceding attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, for the rest of this turn your attacks with a printed difficulty of 3 or less get +1 speed for each card in the card pool preceding it.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: At the beginning of the game, after players have decided turn Order, you may search your deck for a Gloomy Side if you go first or a Jolly Side if you go second. Attach the selected card to your character. E Commit: Your attack gets Multiple: 1. Only playable if you have played at least 2 attacks this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is attached to your character, your character gains the following ability: R Lose 2 vitality: After your attack deals damage, discard it from your card pool. After taking vitality loss that lowers your vitality to 10 or less, discard this card from your character and then search All of your game zones for a copy of Jolly Side and attach it to your character. if you cannot, you lose the game. E: If your attack deals damage, your opponent loses 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
